Reviews.Title: “Bland in Barcelona”
Reviews.Author: Bob T
Reviews.Content: The first thing you'll note abou the NH Numancia is modern decor in the lobby and throughout the hotel. Room was clean, a bit on the small side, and rather spartan in decor. Breakfast in the lower level dining area was fine, and the staff very attentive and food was fine. I'd mark this one down as good, not great and if you're in town for a conference it's convenient to the subway line, and there was never a problem catching a cab. Dining in the area was a bit limited, you'll head out for a truly great experience. If I'm in town again for a conference would be happy to stay again, perhaps not for a leisure visit.

Reviews.Title: “Good clean hotel”
Reviews.Author: amran k
Reviews.Content: The hotel was clean and nice but there was a bad smell from the drains in the morning. also the room had no view. but overall it was a decent hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Good business hotel”
Reviews.Author: rachelopps
Reviews.Content: I stayed here whilst attending an event at the Fira Barcelona. The hotel is about 20 mins walk from the Fira, or 2 stops on the metro. The hotel was very good value and the rooms were a good size, modern and clean. The bed was comfortable and the room service menu and mini bar met my requirements and were very reasonably priced. The breakfast was excellent; there was lots of choice and plenty of food. Very impressed. The most frustrating thing about this hotel was that I had to get my key re-activated/changed every time I wanted to enter my room. Every day, the key would stop working (which the hotel staff said was because it was near my mobile phone in my handbag, although I had nowhere else to store it) so I had to constantly go to Reception to ask them to reactivate or replace my key card. This could be quite frustrating. On occasion the front desk was not manned and one evening I had to wait about 5 minutes and then ring the phone at the front desk to get someone to come out. I think the reception staff may have been sleeping in the back room! Not the best location if you are exploring Barcelona as a tourist and want to see the city centre, as it is at least a taxi ride away. But ideal if you are staying nearby for a business event.

Reviews.Title: “Good quality/price ratio”
Reviews.Author: Magnus C
Reviews.Content: A nice and confortable hotel, located near Sants Station (Renfe, L3 and L5). Our room was a bit small but very clean. The breakfast was abundant and variated. Good quality / price ratio.

Reviews.Title: “Safe bet”
Reviews.Author: MITOMAD
Reviews.Content: I usually find NH hotels to be a very safe bet, and that was the case with NH Numancia, in Barcelona, quite close to the Sants train station, which can be very handy if arrivng/departing by rail--or considering taking it to the airport. Had a modern and very comfortable room, with all the necessary ammenities and which was kept clean. Adjustable heating and air-conditioning in the room, and very correct and professional attention at the front desk.

Reviews.Title: “Tiny room”
Reviews.Author: Lee01
Reviews.Content: Hotel is in a decent location. Quick walk to the metro. Good breakfast. The hotel was clean but I felt very cramped in the room and bathroom.

Reviews.Title: “Nice stay”
Reviews.Author: G5ive
Reviews.Content: My brother and I stayed at this hotel for 2 nights, We were in town to watch an F.C. Barcelona game but also to enjoy the city for the short stay. The hotel is located about a 7-10 minute walk from the train station, Camp Nou staidum is also about a 10 minute or less walk from the hotel, a lot of restaurants and bars nearby and the area is really nice. If you're flying into Barcelona the train station to the city is located within the airport, the station that is near the hotel is the "Sants Estacio" or 'Barcelona Sants" I believe is the third of fourth stop from the airport. As soon as you walk out from the front of the station you straight and than walk slightly to the left and look for the Numancia Street or Carrer de Numancia keep walking up that street and in 7-10 minutes you should arrive at the NH Numancia. The hotel itself is really nice, very well kept, clean and the staff was helpful and very professional. The only problem that I found with this hotel or maybe just my room was that the walls are thin and you can hear the loud conversation and laughs from the people staying next door, I had to knock on the wall because the people that were staying next to us kept talking so loud. Overall I really liked the hotel, as far as I can say my room was small but cozy, no complaints and everything was really good.

Reviews.Title: “Very good”
Reviews.Author: winylake
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 4 nights, and everything was perfect. Is a bit further from sightseeings, but close to subway station. In case of late night, one can still walk back from city centre to hotel. The rooms are a bit small, but you don't spend your time in hotel when you are in Barcelona. Would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “Brilliant!”
Reviews.Author: cubdoc
Reviews.Content: A very contemporary feel to this new hotel in Sants Estació. The Metro Sants Estació is a minutes walk down the hill with the main overground train station 5 minutes away down the hill too. The hotel staff are very welcoming and very professional. The room itself was spacious, modern and clean. It was nice to see a well fitted, clean looking bathroom. I was pleasantly surprised that the hotel was affordable from what looks like from the outside and inside a very slick looking facility. There is a convenience mini market across the street for those essentials - especially those very humid Barcelona Summer days. The Metro is very easy to navigate... several stops away from most destinations. You could continue to walk down from the hotel to Espanya the main square with the fountain at Placa de Carles Buigas, Venetian Towers and the airport bus can be taken from here too. I would recommend you to stay here... great hotel, great neighbourhood and people.

Reviews.Title: “Alright”
Reviews.Author: RichAndAnonymous
Reviews.Content: Well located just near main train/underground station; nice, clean and functional hotel. Well connected too, with several bus lines running at their door step.

Reviews.Title: “Not for singles!!”
Reviews.Author: Matsalleh59
Reviews.Content: Just booked for attending exhbition in Barcelona. They gave me very very very small single room. Room was 2.80x2.30 mt and for more than EURO 160 per night I pretend much more space. Very small bed, look like bed for children. Dirty floor in room. Positive things is location, near the Sants Estacio, main Train Station in Barcelona, near metro station. Breakfast buffet was nice, nice furniture and clean. Employee on reception not so friendly. Internet is free only on lobby for half hour. Basically, if I have to return to Barcelona again I will not come here anymore.

Reviews.Title: “Not so good”
Reviews.Author: sksinghal
Reviews.Content: The room size was too small and flooring was very bed. The air conditioning was not working properly. They don't change the blankets. The location is good, you will find the bus number 59 that goes to centre and beach.

Reviews.Title: “room too dark”
Reviews.Author: Marga2009
Reviews.Content: Can´t the management of this hotel see that there is VERY little light in the rooms? You just have two lamps over the bedside tables and a small one on the desk. I am a frequent traveller and I have never been in a such a dark room! We were unlucky that our room faced a patio with lots of pipes and noise but we could sleep more or less. Apart from that, the room was clean, the location is good and the staff was nice.

Reviews.Title: “Good location, small rooms...overall decent”
Reviews.Author: MD4853
Reviews.Content: Good budget hotel close to Sants Estacio metro. New building, friendly staff. Extremely small rooms.

Reviews.Title: “I enjoied the experience”
Reviews.Author: aleteles
Reviews.Content: NH Numancia is a very modern hotel, in a great area with 2 metro stations very closed. Staff is very helpfull and the breakfast is great, with plenty options of breads, juices, and hot dishes. Numancia is a very big street with many options of restaurants. I recommended the great restaurante Martelo, a few meters from the hotel. The staff is very friendly. I have no complains about my stay at this hotel. If you can, pay a little extra and get a superior room...very, very nice.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay, would return!”
Reviews.Author: jpoc2004
Reviews.Content: Hotel is pefectly situated near Barcelona Sants Metro stop and main train station-perfect to explore beautiful Barcelona and surrounding areas. It was very convinient for Montjuic stadium also as we had a concer booked for this venue. It was 30mins walk approx. Rooms were very clean and well maintained, staff were very friendly and obliging. Breakfast was excellent, great choice and very good standard. Free wi fi in main lobby and reception. Would return and reccomend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “the best for tourism in Barcelona”
Reviews.Author: sammerkayyali
Reviews.Content: located at 5 min on feet from the sants metro station, means you can arrive to the ramblas or to the sagrada directly by metro, and to the airport directly by train (it arrives to the metro station). Very clean room large enough and excellent breakfast. Helpful reception you can depend on them if you're not in an organized trip. I highly recommend this hotel. One of the best price/quality values I've seen in europo till now.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel, good location”
Reviews.Author: kobachisan
Reviews.Content: Clean and comfortable room, safe neighbourhood (we were 2 girls and felt safe walking home at 2AM), free wifi BUT only in lobby and for 30 minutes only... Good location (about 15 minutes from center, walk + metro). However, staff members were not very useful in suggesting attractions/restaurants.

Reviews.Title: “Good location and clean!”
Reviews.Author: JafaAuckland
Reviews.Content: Friendly, english-speaking staff. Despite the paper-thin walls, expensive WI-FI and over-rated, expensive buffet breakfast, I liked this hotel. The close proximity to Sants Estacio allows you to travel freely, you're no more than 15 minutes to most tourist attractions. Numancia is a busy street, so don't expect this to be a quiet location; traffic noise is consistent, but I didn't find it overwhelming. Good basic hotel, not perfect, but good for the price.

Reviews.Title: “Beware - Smoking rooms”
Reviews.Author: Kengele
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at this hotel before, and in general it is totally fine. It has everything I would expect for a hotel of this price, and the hotel staff were friendly. However I was surprised when noticed a smell of smoke in the room (and I am non-smoker), and then I realised it was a "smoking" room. I specifically booked a non-smoking room through Hoteles.com. Checking my booking later I noticed that they had 2 asterisks by my request and below -- ** No podemos garantizar tus preferencias de habitación (we can't guarantee your booking request preferences). I called the reception to try and change the room, and they checked availability but there were any "non-smoking" rooms available, and they politely pointed out the conditions of booking. Careful with this hotel if you want a "non-smoking" room, and check with whoever you book the room that "non-smoking" is guaranteed. If you are a smoker, aside from that I think this hotel is fine, and is very conveniently located near Sants Railway Station if you happen to be travelling by bus or train.

Reviews.Title: “If you want to sleep, don't stay here.”
Reviews.Author: BklynGiraffe
Reviews.Content: My husband and I had one night here before we left for Casablanca and thank goodness that's all it was. I swear the people above us were dragging chains across the floor all night and clanking around in high heels. The walls I think are made out of cardboard you can hear everything, we heard someone snoring in the next room. We heard everytime anyone used the bathroom because it sounded like our bathroom was flooding. I think we slept maybe an hour or two. Never again.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely hotel in great location”
Reviews.Author: Kab0789
Reviews.Content: Travelling with girlfriends and having never been to the city before we didn't really know where to stay and what to do but the NH Numancia was perfect for us. If you fly to the main airport you can get a train to the main train station, Barcelona Sants, and the hotel is 5 minutes walk up the road from there. If you are in Barcelona for a few days definately buy a T10 travel card for 8.25 euros and the train from and to the airport can be included in that and worth every penny. The hotel itself is on a busy road with a number of bars and restaurants and shops. The rooms were spot on - very clean and stylish, even including a fridge stocked with food and drink and a bathroom with all the smellies you need even a toothbrush! The busy road outside cannot be heard and the black out curtains made the nights sleep even better. We didn't eat at the restaurants so cannot comment on them but we were slightly disappointed the bar was shut on weekends. The hotel is in a perfect location 10 minutes train ride away from the La Ramblas and overall we would definately recommend this hotel and stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Decent hotel - ideal for budget travellers”
Reviews.Author: JPreviews
Reviews.Content: The hotel is decent with cozy rooms. Breakfast is included in the tariff but the timing is very late and should be a bit earlier. It is quite far from the airport and does not have much around the hotel, except a small supermarket on the opp side of the street. Value for money hotel and staff is good. If given a choice i would not like to go back to it due to its location. Though tube station is 5 mins walk and the famous fountain is 15 mins walk.

Reviews.Title: “Basic faultless business hotel”
Reviews.Author: Frankieandcharl
Reviews.Content: When you go to Mobile World Congress in February, you generally fear the hotel you will be put in. This one is very well located, confortable, efficient and in a good taxi friendly location. Decent breakfast too. Welldone

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel does what it says on the tin”
Reviews.Author: Mclaren55
Reviews.Content: Me and my girlfriend stayed in the NH Numancia for 3 nights the Hotel has a real modern and crisp feel as you enter and this is carried on when you get to the rooms. All the staff speak great English, and the room service was quick with the food been of great quality. The area around the hotel is quiet and although they may be not much to see, only 3 mins walk to the metro main line which will connect you all of Barcelona, and for 3 euros you can get a train back to the Airport when its time to leave. I would recommend this Hotel to anyone looking for a high quality hotel at a good price

Reviews.Title: “A nice place to stay in”
Reviews.Author: Visitor4now
Reviews.Content: Despite its somewhat low rating we got a recommendation for the place The hotel is a nice place to stay in The room and bathroom cast a nice environment There are some ergonomics issues in bathroom but the most important issue is that the mattresses were very average.Not bad though but could be significantly improved (may be they were just too soft). Beside that we enjoyed our stay although not cheap ~113euro per room per niught - breakfast not included (depends on time and season though) When you order from the internet we suggest you verify your order Location: although not in the center it's a 5min walk from a metro station (L3 if not mistaken) which brings us rapidly to the city center

Reviews.Title: “excellent value for money and location”
Reviews.Author: sandle22
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel when it was on special offer, £75 for two nights. It was excellent value for money. The hotel was very modern and clean. The rooms were a little on the small side and the bathrooms are a tight squeeze but if your seeing the sights then your not going to spend that much time in the room anyway. Really good powerful shower and the bed was amazingly comfortable! The location of this hotel is really good as well. Although its not in the centre its five minutes walk from the nearest metro station and has a few decent bars and restaurants within walking distance. Would stay at this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “NOT FOR LIGHT SLEEPERS”
Reviews.Author: sweet4
Reviews.Content: I always do my homework first before i book anywhere,but this time i don't think the previous reviews of this Hotel where acurate enough. Yes the Hotel is lovely and clean and modern,we loved it but it was not Location Location. From Girona airport a taxi was €120,by bus it was something like €20 but it took 1 and 1/2 hrs to get to Barcelona City,then we had to get a taxt to the hotel,it was to much traveling for us as our flight was early in the morning we had to get up at 4am. For a glass of wine at the hotel it cost €7.50 which was ridiculous.Our 2 teenagers stayed in the room next to ours and you could here every single word they said without any exageration,plus the people next to our room kept me up all night,it sounded like they where moving furniture the whole night.We found Barcelona to expensive for us, for lunch in Las Ramblas it cost €70 a pizza was 9 and we shared because of the expense, we also bought bread,salad and cold meats from the supermarket across the road from the hotel and ate in our room as it was €12 per head for breakfast. When we went to the port it only cost us €22 and that was at TAPA TAPA.

Reviews.Title: “The Hottest Room ever!”
Reviews.Author: occhi21
Reviews.Content: I bought this hotel via priceline for $85, if I would have spent more I would have been upset. I stayed here on my honeymoon in Nov, when we checked in we mentioned that, so the staff gave a us a corner room,with double beds. the room faced the inner walls of the hotel so there was no air. While the hotel had rooms that faced the street with a balcony! We went into our room and remind you it was Nov, blazing hot!When we checked in I remember an American saying that the room was way too hot and the staff just ignored her. My husband and I put on the AC and it wasnt working, I called front desk and they told me they shut off the AC in Oct and to deal with the room. that is my only complait about the room. The room was very new and very clean. Also the lighting was very bad! The area is located about 5 walking blocks from the main train station, 1 block from the metro which takes you to all the major sites of the city,across the street from a great supermarket.It isnt in a tourist area so almost everything is closed on Sunday The hotel has a restaur, but they also rec. a nice but however pricey place about 3 block away towards the train station. The owner tried to pull one over us Americans by charging us the most expensive item twice, once on the top and then again on the bottom, they laughed it off but I knew it was done on purpose! So be careful

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, impolite receptionist”
Reviews.Author: aTravelerdk
Reviews.Content: Good location and far from noisy places. It's a modern hotel with reasonable price. Near train station and there is also a parking lot in the basement. A staff was not friendly but she can still help if you need some things.

Reviews.Title: “This is an excellent hotel in a very convenient location...”
Reviews.Author: PaulinBath
Reviews.Content: We have just had a fabulous 9 day holiday in Barcelona and have stayed at the Numancia throughout. The hotel is in the district of Sants which is a quiet, safe suburb of the city. It is within easy reach of the city centre via the Metro. The Sants Estancia Metro station is only 5 minutes walk from the hotel. The main Sants railway station is only 10 minutes away and from there it is easy to reach the airport and towns along the coast from Barcelona such as the lovely resort of Sitges. The hotel is spotlessly clean, the rooms are modern and well appointed and the breakfast offers a great and nuritioning start to the day. We were made extremely welcome by the staff throughout our stay. We would definitely stay there again and would recommend it to others without hesitation.

Reviews.Title: “We will stay here in our next visit to Barcelona”
Reviews.Author: PPromenade
Reviews.Content: We absolutelly recommend this hotel in Barcelona. I must say the rooms are smaller than I have expected, but its modern decoration and impecable cleaningness made it worthed. It is located in a calm neighbourhood with great access to metro and train station.

Reviews.Title: “An ideal location”
Reviews.Author: samlincoln
Reviews.Content: What a lovely hotel to stay in. The staff were so friendly and helpful; it really was like home from home. The room was very clean and spacious and very well maintained. We were here four a four night city break and found the location excellent for getting to the main attractions by the most efficient tube system we have ever come across. The breakfast was varied and very adequate with a nice variety of choice, includind a hot breakfast at no extra cost. We would certainly recommend this hotel not only for the quality of service but also for the excellent store across the road that provided for our needs whilst sightseeing the city.

Reviews.Title: “modern design hotel services can improve”
Reviews.Author: Laphroaig47
Reviews.Content: The hotel has been redesigned, and is looking a lot more modern. I had stayed here before. What was disappointing was the restaurant : quality and service are good, but I was all alone in the restaurant. Eating alone is one thing, eating alone in an empty restaurant is worse. TV : no pay TV so only movies in spanish and the usual CNN stuff, I expect a modern hotel to have better facilities for TV.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Rooms but Staff Stole”
Reviews.Author: Tall_RC
Reviews.Content: Went to Barcelona last Feb/March and the room was clean, if not a little small and we loved the neighborhood. Great small bars throughout the neighborhood that were very friendly, helpful and hospitable. Breakfast was a little spendy but acceptable. Only thing that took away from an above average rating was someone (probably housekeeping) stole 3 shirts from my wife's open suitcase. Which we discovered as we were packing to leave at 4 am and we told mgmt about our missing shirts and they said MAYBE we missed them when packing (didn't because we went thru the room with a find-tooth comb) and then they said maybe we packed them and forgot about it or overlooked it (checked when we got home and NO they were missing). Mgmt did nothing about it after we returned to the States. Very disappointing BUT I loved the city and would tell everyone who has a chance, to please visit!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Pimpalicious
Reviews.Content: I have just come back from a 3 night stay at the NH Numancia, I found the hotel to be excellent, it was clean, modern and I found the location to be great. The hotel itself is a five minute walk from the Sants Estacio Metro station, the metrol station is on the "green" line and I found that most of the tourist attractions are on this line so you are pretty much central to everything. It is also only a 15 minute walk away from the Nou Camp. By staying at this hotel you are not in the hustle and bustle and for me personally I found this a good thing. The area surrounding the hotel is very nice and clean and quiet. There is also a supermarket just across the road which is always helpful. The room was very modern and clean and had everything that you needed. We did not have a view from our window however that did not bother me as you are only really there to sleep! My only concern about the hotel is the restaurant, my boyfriend and I chose to eat there one night as we were feeling pretty tired! Having looked at the menu we thought that due to the types of dishes that were availiable we felt that the food would be up to a high standard. The food was awful!!!! We both ordered the lamb, it was stone cold and when we did complain the waitress did not seem to care or be concerned, I think this was due to the language barrier. It was definitely not worth the 60 Euros that we spent on it! Overall I would recommend this hotel as it is very clean and modern and the location is ideal.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Staff..”
Reviews.Author: smonkey5b
Reviews.Content: Just returned from a two night stay at this hotel and could not have been happier with the service we received. We arrived on Saturday lunchtime and the young man on reception was so helpful and obviously proud of the City. Location was perfect for us as we were there to watch Barca play and it is only a fifteen minute walk to Camp Nou. Breakfast was lovely with a very good selection. Would stay at this hotel again without hesitation.
